mapper.sql: id, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date, task_id, order_no, work_id, work_type
mapper.insert:
insert into fm_task_order_work_relation
id,
created_by,
updated_by,
task_id,
order_no,
work_id,
work_type,
created_date, updated_date,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE(), SYSDATE()
mapper.update:
update fm_task_order_work_relation
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fm_task_order_work_relation set created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select created_by as createdBy, created_date as createdDate, updated_by as updatedBy, updated_date as updatedDate, id, task_id as taskId, order_no as orderNo, work_id as workId, work_type as workType from fm_task_order_work_relation where order_no =#{orderNo}

select r.created_by as createdBy, r.created_date as createdDate, r.updated_by as updatedBy, r.updated_date as updatedDate, r.id, r.task_id as taskId, r.order_no as orderNo, r.work_id as workId, r.work_type as workType from fm_task_order_work_relation r where task_id =#{taskId} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fm_order o WHERE o.order_no=r.order_no AND o.deal_stat='07')
